title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - A32nx - Planning a flight using airways
description:
In this how to we are going to look at how to plan a flight using a combination of direct flights and airways using the flybywire A32NX addon for Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020.

The flight we are going to program is from Amsterdam Schiphol Airport (EHAM) to John F Kennedy Airport (KJFK) in New York. We will use a combination of both airways and direct flight options and in addition have a look at how you can remove entries which are not correct.

AS320NX can be downloaded from this site: https://flybywiresim.com/a32nx

The tool used to plan our flight simBrief can be found here: https://www.simbrief.com
